channel.title: Cineplex on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cineplex on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cineplex’s Next Challenge: Activist Investor Pushes For Share Repurchases, Asset Sales
item.description: “We are frustrated by the absence of a sense of urgency exhibited by the company’s leadership,” Windward Management said in a letter to the Canadian exhibition giant.

item.title: Cineplex’s Next Challenge: Activist Investor Pushes For Share Repurchases, Asset Sales
item.description: “We are frustrated by the absence of a sense of urgency exhibited by the company’s leadership,” Windward Management said in a letter to the Canadian exhibition giant.

item.title: Cineplex CEO Opens Up About Retirement in 2026 As Box Office Momentum Picks Up
item.description: The Canadian exhibition giant led by Ellis Jacob shrunk its second quarter loss as overall revenues jumped on strong Hollywood box office for titles like ‘Minecraft’ and ‘Lilo & Stitch.’
